titleStmt.title: This is the table of the historye of reynart the foxe
Reynard the Fox.
titleStmt.author: Caxton, William, ca. 1422-1491.

notesStmt.note: A translation, by William Caxton, of: Die historie van Reinaert die vos, gheprent ter goude in hollant by mi gheraert leeu Jnt iaer Mcccc en Lxxix.--Blades, William Caxton, v.2 p.87.
Signatures: A-H [blank]¹ I K-L⁶ (A1 and L6 blank).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
